_sText:
OK, details:
There are 8 chambers to get pass throught, and in the first laberint there's a trap.

In thouse places you see elevated, you don't have to touch the floor, because it will kill you.

Maximum number of players: 24, 12 per team, also, there is a monitor on each chamber to see the progress of the ball, the most buttons you touch, more probabilities to win.
